backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence manifest mapping features to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable setup defining light and dark color tokens and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring global audio, mood toggle, animated background, and routing across seven pages.
frontend/src/audio/GlobalAudioProvider.t: Context provider managing a persistent looping audio element with play/pause/toggle controls.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: Animated SVG background rendering hearts and sparkles that adapt to day/night mode.
frontend/src/components/GlassPanel.tsx: Simple wrapper applying the global glass-panel styling to content.
frontend/src/components/GlobalAudioToggl: Fixed-position button that toggles global background music.
frontend/src/components/GlobalMoodToggle: Fixed-position button switching between day and night mode with icon changes.
frontend/src/components/HeartConfetti.ts: Generates 30 falling heart SVGs for celebratory confetti animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity restoration, and login status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles plus a romantic color theme, night‑mode variants, and reusable UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Page1Welcome.tsx: Displays a timed welcome overlay followed by a themed introduction page with navigation and audio controls.
frontend/src/pages/Page2MeaningOfRoses.t: Shows a grid of rose types with expandable meanings and a button to continue the flow.
frontend/src/pages/Page3BouquetBuilder.t: Lets users add up to 12 roses to a virtual bouquet and wrap it before proceeding.
frontend/src/pages/Page4AcceptMyFlower.t: Asks the user to accept a flower with playful UI behavior and shows confetti and a thank‑you screen upon acceptance.
frontend/src/pages/Page5Music.tsx: Renders a music-themed page with an icon, instructions for using the music toggle, and a Next button triggering the flow store’s next action.
frontend/src/pages/Page6FinalMessage.tsx: Displays a final heartfelt message with styled text and a Next button that advances the microsite flow.
frontend/src/pages/Page7Replay.tsx: Shows a closing farewell screen with an image, sentimental text, and a replay button that restarts the flow.
frontend/src/state/micrositeFlowStore.ts: Defines a Zustand store managing page flow state, including advancing pages, replaying, and flags for bouquet and flower acceptance.
frontend/src/state/moodStore.ts: Creates a Zustand store for day/night mode with sessionStorage persistence and a toggle function.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color palettes, plugins, and custom theme settings including rose and pink color scales.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, known issues, and thematic/technical requirements for the romantic microsite.
